sen.j: 尾上菊之助（おのえ きくのすけ）は、歌舞伎役者の名跡の一。
sen.e: Kikunosuke ONOE was a professional name of a kabuki actor.
Kikunosuke ONOE is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor's professional name.
Kikunosuke ONOE is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor's professional name.
His stage family name was Otowaya.
The stage family name is Otowaya.
The stage family name is Otowaya.
The present head of the family is Kikunosuke ONOE the fifth.
Current Kikunosuke ONOE is the fifth.
Current Kikunosuke ONOE is the fifth.

sen.j: 定紋は重ね扇に抱き柏、また四ツ輪。
sen.e: The jomon was double fans or four rings with a pair of Japanese emperor leaves.
The Jomon (family crest) is Kasaneogi ni Daki Kashiwa (double fans with a pair of Japanese emperor leaves) or Yotsu-wa (four rings).
The Jomon (family crest) is Kasaneogi ni Daki Kashiwa (double fans with a pair of Japanese emperor leaves) or Yotsu-wa (four rings).

sen.j: 通常は尾上菊五郎の前名で、尾上丑之助の後に襲名することが多い。
sen.e: In general, he took the earlier stage name of Ushinosuke ONOE and then succeeded to Kikugoro ONOE.
In general, it is often used after Ushinosuke ONOE and before Kikugoro ONOE.
In general, it is often used after Ushinosuke ONOE and before Kikugoro ONOE.

sen.j: 本来は立役系統の名跡であるが、尾上梅幸 (7代目)のように女形で継いだ例もある。
sen.e: It was originally the professional name of tachiyaku (leading male-role actors), but in some cases, actors of female roles, such as Baiko ONOE the seventh, succeeded to the name.
It was originally the professional name of tachiyaku (leading male-role actors), but in some cases, onnagata (actors of female roles), such as Baiko ONOE (the seventh), succeeded to the name.
It was originally the professional name of tachiyaku (leading male-role actors), but in some cases, onnagata (actors of female roles), such as Baiko ONOE (the seventh), succeeded to the name.

sen.j: 所謂大名跡ではないので家の芸の類は存在しないが、だいたい音羽屋系統の役を得意にすることが多い。
sen.e: Since it is not a so-called famous professional name, Kikunosuke ONOE does not have any own art of his family, but is excelled at playing roles of the Otowaya line.
Since it is not a so-called famous professional name, it does not have any own art, but is excelled at playing roles of the Otowaya line.
Since it is not a so-called famous professional name, it does not have any own art, but is excelled at playing roles of the Otowaya line.

sen.j: - 三代目尾上菊五郎の次男で四代目尾上菊五郎の養子。
sen.e: - Second son of Kikugoro ONOE the third and adopted son of Kikunosuke ONOE the fourth
The second son of the third Kikugoro ONOE and an adopted son of the fourth Kikugoro ONOE.
The second son of the third Kikugoro ONOE and an adopted son of the fourth Kikugoro ONOE.

sen.j: - 五代目尾上菊五郎の養子。
sen.e: - Adopted child of Kikugoro ONOE the fifth
An adopted child of the fifth Kikugoro ONOE.
An adopted child of the fifth Kikugoro ONOE.
He was a model of Zangiku Monogatari (The Story of the Last Chrysanthemum).
He was a model of Zangiku Monogatari (The Story of the Last Chrysanthemum).
He was a model of Zangiku Monogatari (The Story of the Last Chrysanthemum).

tit.cmt: 原文には 「尾上梅幸 (7代目)」とありましたが、リンク先の単語のようです。ウェブで確認すると用語が「尾上菊之助 (3代目)」となっており、本来はこちらの用語を使用していると思われますので、こちらを訳出し、原文修正しました。

sen.j: - 四代目尾上丑之助、七代目尾上梅幸。
sen.e: - Ushinosuke ONOE the fourth, Baiko ONOE the seventh
The fourth Ushinosuke ONOE and the seventh Baiko ONOE.
The fourth Ushinosuke ONOE and the seventh Baiko ONOE.

tit.cmt: 原文には 「尾上菊五郎 (7代目)」とありましたが、リンク先の単語のようです。ウェブで確認すると用語が「尾上菊之助 (4代目)」となっており、本来はこちらの用語を使用していると思われますので、こちらを訳出し、原文修正しました。

sen.e: - First son of Kikugoro ONOE the third
The oldest son of the third.
The oldest son of the third.

sen.j: 五代目尾上丑之助、七代目尾上菊五郎。
sen.e: Ushinosuke ONOE the fifth, Kikugoro ONOE the seventh
The fifth Ushinosuke ONOE, the seventh Kikugoro ONOE.
The fifth Ushinosuke ONOE, the seventh Kikugoro ONOE.
- First son of Kikunosuke ONOE the fourth
The oldest son of the fourth.
The oldest son of the fourth.
Ushinosuke ONOE the sixth
The sixth Ushinosuke ONOE.
